sql.query:
select trt.id, trt.user_number as recharge_mobile, trt.opening_balance, trt.amount, trt.comm_amt, trt.charge_amt, trt.net_amt, trt.closing_balance,
trt.tr_mode, trt.status, trt.tr_id, trt.api_logs, trt.api_ref, trt.live, trt.tr_date, mo.operator_name, ms.service_name, mu.user_id, mu.user_fname, mu.user_mobile 
from tt_recharge_trans trt
left join m_operator mo on mo.id = trt.op_id and mo.service_id = trt.service_id 
left join m_service ms on ms.id = trt.service_id 
left join m_users mu on mu.id = trt.user_id 
where ms.service_name = 'Mobile' or ms.service_name = 'Prepaid' or ms.service_name = 'Wallet'
order by trt.id desc limit 50;
